Description:
Detects the deletion of the PowerShell console History logs which may indicate an attempt to destroy forensic evidence

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: PowerShell Console History Logs Deleted
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where filepath like '%\psreadline\consolehost_history.txt'
